name: privatestay.com
tag_list: accommodation, private-accommodation, bb, bed-and-breakfast, holiday-house, guest-house, hotel, motel, lodging, pension, cheap-stay, family-stay, farm-stay, guesthouse, villa, chalet, cottage, apartment, room, self-catering, private-stay
overview:
Privatestay.com is a web directory for private or family run holiday lodging or short term accommodation.

Typically these are B&B’s, guest houses, holiday homes, apartments or private rooms in the owners home. They may also be small boutique hotels, home stays, farm stays, inn’s, lodges etc. The theme is that the accommodation is privately or family run.

The accommodation host or manager enters and maintains the details about their property in the directory themselves. Guests browse the property listings, searching for an accommodation that suits their needs. The guest can contact the host directly to make enquiries or to arrange a booking.

Privatestay.com offers free and premium listings as well as packages including a professional website.
